snippet: French prosecutors have begun a manslaughter investigation after a man died after taking part in an experimental drug trial for a painkiller.
abstract: One participant dies and five others are hospitalized following drug trial for experimental painkiller under development by Portuguese pharmaceutical company Bial; investigation by French authorities could include manslaughter charges.
lead_paragraph: French prosecutors have begun a manslaughter investigation after a man died after taking part in an experimental drug trial for a painkiller.

headline.main: Man Dies in France After Painkiller Drug Trial
headline.print_headline: Man Dies After Experimental Drug Trial
